content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I'm pleased to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price. I am aiming for the highest possible price. Please make your first offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for a place that is affordable for me. I think a fair price for this apartment would be around 500 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That price is too low for me. I am the owner of this apartment, and I am looking to get the highest possible price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want a high price, but I also need to consider my budget as a student. How about we meet in the middle and say 600 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 600 Euro per month is still too low for me. I am the owner of this apartment, and I am looking to get the highest possible price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 650 Euro per month? I think this is a fair price for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 650 Euro per month is still too low for me. I am the owner of this apartment, and I am looking to get the highest possible price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want a high price. But as a student, I need to consider my budget. How about we agree on 700 Euro per month? This is the highest I can afford right now.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 700 Euro per month is still too low for me. I am the owner of this apartment, and I am looking to get the highest possible price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I feel like we are repeating ourselves. I offered 700 Euro per month, which is the highest I can afford, and you keep asking for more without giving any reason why you need more.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your point of view, but as a landlord, it is my right to seek the highest possible price for my property. I apologize if you feel we are repeating ourselves. However, I did not agree to the price of 700 Euro per month. If you do not wish to continue the negotiation, we can terminate it here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
